content.value:
Panorama Café Hostel is in Buenavista. Buenavista is located a 45-60 minutes bus ride from Armenia, the capital for the province of Quindio. You find our hostel just 2 blocks from the main plaza in the tiny town of Buenavista, a place of a very special Colombian coffee. The Panorama Café Hostel is located centrally in the town but you feel like being in the countryside as we´re situated on the hillside of the village overlooking the valley with their plantations and farms.

Panorama Café Hostel has 4 rooms. This place is great to stay if you want to live real experiences with the locals, also the town offers great variety of extreme sports such as Mountain Biking, Canyoning, or Paragliding. As our guests you will get discounts on the tours of Experiencia Cafetera. (e. g. the Wakecup Experience, one of the top 10 rated activity on Tripadvisor in this area)

Panorama Café Hostel is for the generation of travelers looking for discovery and joy in an authentic way.
Panorama Café Hostel is completely off the main path. This place will bring coffee lovers around the world to learn about this culture and live with the locals. We are the first and only hostel in Buenavista.As well we provide a full equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Our staff is in love with coffee and everything related to it. BREAKFAST IS NOT INCLUDED. Is optional with us, will cost: 7000 COP per person (coffee or te, arepa o bread, eggs, fruits and cereal) From 8:30 am to 10:00 am.
